Wednesday at 4pm - 8pm will be our All White Psytrance world class DJ Party!
name: Badlands Bordello

description: Camp to be Continued... welcomes the wandering creative souls to come create and enjoy some physical and interactive art. Come work at our Reverse Bar and lead some spontaneous art sessions. Enjoy a sit in our shaded art garden or find a new friend at our 24 hour a day-Sarah McLachlan Playa Pet Adoption Center.
name: Camp to be Continued...

description: Grateful Floyd is a small theme camp dedicated to good music and frosty cold draft IPA. We'll be hosting a medallion-making event on Wednesday at 11am. Our signature event, Pink Floyd's Delicate Sound of Thunder concert on the big screen, is a don't-miss. -- Thursday at 8pm. And come back on Friday evening to our Cult Movie night at 8pm.
name: Grateful Floyd

description: At Tickled Mink … where everyone's a star! … we are here to help zhuzh you at our Hollywood minkup mirror vanity before you start channeling your inner diva. If you don't know how, we'll teach you to smeyes like a mink, so once you sink into our fuzzy, plush, cerulean photo throne, you'll be oh so ready to strike a picture perfect pose as your glamour cover page photo shoot begins. You've never looked more minktacular!
name: Tickled Mink

description: Slutty Microphone provides an open mic stage that hosts guest live music performances 24/7. Our stage includes a shared keyboard, drum kit, guitar, and a few other instruments. Bands are welcome!
name: Slutty Microphone

description: Camp Fantastic Sams is the playa's diner and dive. We serve breakfast during the week (check the schedule) and drinks when we feel like it. We are LGBTQIA+ friendly, and look forward to seeing you at our camp.
name: Fantastic Sams

description: Wanted!  Ya git yer dusty boots on and giddyup on down to the I'm OK, You're OK Corral to wet yer whistle. We are servin' up cold drinks, trash talkin' and more! We're the rootinist tootinist band of misfits. Bring yer own glass and your ID.  21+  Open 12pm to 6pm and 11pm to  whenever.
name: I'm OK, You're OK Corral

description: Azul is a wellness camp made up of sustainable and natural materials, including moroccan cushions, rugs, and pillows, for a sense of being low to the earth and completely relaxed in the environment. Our wellness programming is about creating transformational experiences that allow people to try on a different way of living at one with themselves and the universe.
name: Azul

description:
Welcome to the Friend Zone! A place where no one will fuck you.
This camp is all about friendship. No need to worry about trying to hook up because platonic love is all that's on the menu. We'll be hosting a mix and mingle featuring a sing along and delicious craft cocktails. We'll also be gifting BFF necklaces so you can share the love with your life long mate or your new playa bestie.
Be sure to participate in our pen pal exchange program and make a new burner friend from the Midwest.
Stop by and make friends, see friends, be friends!
name: The Friend Zone

description: Ojo Grande Solar Powered Self Propelled Mobile Tiki Bar Hydration Station
name: Ojo Grande Tiki Bar

description: Northern lights camp that is bringing Saunas to the playa, to keep burners from getting cold in the late evening and night.
name: Northern Lights

description:
Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs provides year round meals and civic participation opportunities for local members of the homeless community.  We also help promote and sustain third world coffee farmers.  Our gift we supply at the burn and local civic events is freshly roasted, freshly ground, pour over coffee service featurng coffee grown on small farms in Uganda, Costa Rica, and  El Salvador.
We are dedicated to supporting coffee growing communities in remote regions of the world.
Updates are being reported on the nonprofit Connected by our Humanity Website
name: Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs

description:
Eyes of the Soul is camp dedicated to enhancing the 3 forgotten R's of Burning Man. 
(Replenish, Refresh, & Reflect) We host events that help Burners thrive in those aspects during their journey. 

Our Signature event is an Eye Make-up, Astrology Reading, and Tea event. 
Often called the windows to your soul, eyes hold special meaning and represent so much of your inner beauty. We hope to enhance your unique eyes and allow your inner beauty to shine through!

We also complete an Astrology Reading. We hope this will help you reflect a little more on who you are, and open yourself up to everything the universe has in store for your at Burning Man.

You will also be served a delicious organic tea that will calm you down and open you to softer sides of this amazing experience we call Burning Man.
name: Eyes of the Soul

description: Galapagos is a camp that celebrates wordplay, silliness and creative joy in a sunny and island-themed setting! Come swing on our giant swing set or relax in the shade of our green turtle-shaped dome. We'll have events most days from 2-4pm. Get your nails done and listen to off-the-cuff TED talks at ManiTEDi, drink smoothies and celebrate all things smooth at our SMOOTH event, plus more surprises we'll dream up for this year's Burn.
name: Galapagos

description:
Yes: adv – Used to express affirmation, agreement, positive affirmation, or consent.
Please: adv – Give pleasure to or to be pleasing to; give satisfaction.

Yes Please is the answer to every question. Come chill in our calm and revitalizing sanctuary, dance with new friends, and experience our inclusive oasis of sex-positivity, queer empowerment, and love. Be sure to visit our infamous Non-Monogamy Advice Booth.
name: Yes Please

description: Camp Caralho is a close-knit, gay-friendly diverse camp with a history at burning man that goes back to 1993, Come chill out in our Art Light Chill Space or learn something new about: Coffee Appreciation, Playa Cooking, Or old time Gay Flagging.
name: Camp Caralho

description: "Upsie Daisy" as you climb our 3-story tower with observation deck for a prime view over BRC.  Dangle from the tower's swings, hammocks, and lyra.  Enjoy music from the house band.  Join us in band "jam-a-longs", sports tourneys, or other activities listed daily at the tower.  Welcome to the home of the SF Danglers Dress-Up Street Hockey Society.
name: Camp Upsie Dasium

description: Earth. Air. Water. Fire. The place to nurture your nature. Experience the balance and amplification of the four elements through yoga, workshops, sound, and dance parties. We provide flow, connection, and restoration for people of all identities and points of view. Magic happens here. Home of the Space Cow People and the MIDNIGHT SAFARI PARTY on Thursday.
name: ELEMENTUM

description:
L.E.Dead Dinosaur - where it's Halloween (and Dinosaurs) every night!  

Come by in the evening to grab some LEDs & cold beer while you listen to music, dance at our nightly Halloween party, or play a spoooooky game.

During the day we'll have bar specials, more lectures, and many workshops.  Our petting zoo is open 24/7 if you want to see some dinos.
name: LED Dinosaur

description: Wet Dreams
name: Wet Dreams

description: Destindipity is an inviting and restful neighborhood camp that welcomes all weary Black Rock City citizens with its afternoon teas, comfy shaded spaces, and dreamy events. Our campers are the consummate hosts, welcoming anyone in for a hot or cold tea and a friendly conversation. Destindipity feels like a break from the intensity of the day, like a comforting hug from a close friend or neighbor. Our experiences make you pause for a moment to reflect on your secret dreams, and then spin you off in a new direction for your next playa adventure.
name: Destindipity

description:
Signature cocktails, hydration, and murder under the shade.
Join our theatrical company for murder most foul, don those sexy heels and join us for the drag races and disco, or join us for the neighborhood block party on Sunday!
name: Clue Bar (Murder Mysteries)

description: Do you trust what you see, or is it just a mirage? Find us and escape into a space of refuge and whimsy, get misted in the oasis, or receive your judgment in an IRL version of Am I the Asshole? and be featured on the Wall of Disillusionment.
name: Sacrificial Harem

description:
We are an art support camp that supports two art installation, both by artist Darrell Ansted, a nine-time Burning Man artist.  Darrell will be bringing Awaken, a new piece for 2022, and part of Centered, a 2019 Burning Man art installation.

Our campmates come from all over the United States - Boulder, CO; Park City, UT; Jackson Hole, WY; Detriot, MI; Seattle, WA; Albany, GA: and Los Angeles, CA.
name: Camp Connection

description: Gaylactic Invaders Village is returning to the playa in search of intergalactic love slaves for shenanigans. Out-of-this-world beverages and workshops held throughout the burn. Resistance is futile - stop by and be assimilated!
name: Gaylactic Invaders

description: The "Must Have App" camp returns for high-tech workshops and shenanigans.
name: Time To Burn

description: The pinhole project provides daily art making workshops and hosts a gallery of the pinhole photography art we create throughout the week. We maintain a large fleet of cameras which we use to document the art and community of Burning Man. We believe this traditional analog form of photography provides a nice contrast for folks to slow down and become more present with art making. Our offering is art making, communal effort, inclusion and gifting. Ideally, we like to take pinhole photographs of playa artists in front of their installations. We believe documenting creators with their work is a delicious form of acknowledgement and provides a wonderful gift.
name: Pinhole Project

description: For The Curious
name: Hostel

description:
UnExSpecTedSexEd Talks is a group of Holistic Sexuality Educators led by 
G-Force to bring you deep into talks about unique, unusual, surprising and unexpected topics sprouting from  the intersection of emotional, physical, mental and spiritual sexuality themes. 

Dental health & sexuality -  Why do I have herpes on my chin or on back of my leg? -  How your energy centers affect your pleasure -  What is this fluid coming out of me? & many more...

Come join us for informative only talks. There is no exchange of fluids nor physical demonstration during the talks.
name: UnExPecTedSexEd Talks

description: Groundhaus is a poorly planned community featuring BRCGC spinning Industrial, EBM, Cold Wave, Dark Wave, Deathrock, Synthpop, RETRO, New Wave and more.
name: Groundhaus

description: We serve cold alcohol Tiki Punch, for those age 21 and over (ID is required), starting at 11:00am daily. We serve all day and into the night. Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. Stop in and have a seat in shade or where you can get some sun. You are bound to meet someone new and the environment here encourages having conversations. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get "leid". Come party with us for our 12th year & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly. Remember nude is not lewd.
name: Party Naked Tiki Bar

description: Relaxing and refreshing paradise in the scorching desert sun for the dusty travelers of the playa to enjoy the legendary hospitality of the bedouins.
name: Bedouins Camp

description: Stop by for our SnowCone and FireFries Parties, 1-3 each afternoon Monday through Saturday, sit a spell out of the sun and take a look at our Contraptions.
name: Contraptionists

description: We have a fetish for all things Asian and would love to share it with you!
name: Asian Fetish Camp

description: Floristonia - Offering a daily Margarita Bar, non-alcoholic and ice cold water, under a relaxing, soothing, shady space.  Stop by and say hello.
name: Floristonia

description: An awesome bar that throws different theme parties throughout the week. Stop by and check out what shenanigans we are up to!
name: Theme Camp Theme Camp

description:
Our camp is focused on health and happiness; health through fresh vegetables and fruits at the Black Rock Farmers Market in the mornings and happiness and festivities at the Carrot Club in the afternoons. 
     Enjoy tasty, fresh produce to feed the body, refresh the spirit, and nourish the soul! One of the best parts of exploring any city is checking out the farmer's market- and Black Rock City is no exception! Come try one of our wide array of fresh fruits and veggies! 
    In the afternoons, join us for fruit and vegetable based cocktails at the Carrot Club, or better yet, ride our bike operated blenders to prepare one of our signature alcohol infused smoothies
name: Orange Root Theory

description: CAMP SCATTER pays tribute to the all but forgotten Prince of Mayhem, Elvis' chimpanzee, SCATTER PRESLEY, who once reigned over GRACELAND with a bottle of Bourbon and an unbridled libido. This pampered CHIMP was draped in the finest studded jumpsuits and was known to be the life of the party. We celebrate our friendly furry fiend with daily shenanigans and nightly Elvis movies featuring the most unruly interruptions at our legendary BANANA HAMMOCK THEATER. Stop by and swing with us; grab a banana rum shot or an ice-cold beer and put your monkey feet up.
name: Camp Scatter

description: WünderMint is a multicultural theme camp in its fourth year with members hailing from four different continents. Take a break from the playa to rest under the chandeliers or join us at our Wed champagne and lingerie sunset party! We will host events most afternoons in our theme-focused civic space. Come by, say hello and interact!
name: WünderMint

description: Drop anchor at one of the playa's exquisite beachfront properties and nurture body and soul with our beach yoga, beach games, and beach bar (M-F, 9a-6p). Come try our signature lobster pizza during our Wednesday late afternoon Pizza Palooza. We are a group of beach lovers operating a 100% green camp. If this all sounds like you, let us know. We accept newbies and are willing to help them adjust to the playa.
name: Ocean Beach

description:
Once you have done something, it's hard to convince yourself that you can't. It's not that you think your way into a new way of acting, it's that you act your way into a new way of being.
 
This is transformation in the world as it is. It's easier said than done, and way more possible and fun together.

Creating an evolving culture and context of doing new things for the first time is as much play as it is art as it is an ever rendering ecology of everything we are and share with one another. 

Getting to be what we each are, and being there to help each other get there. That's the Why. It's All Made Up is a dynamic home, platform and connecting place to do so.

We are known for: DC Containers, Sky Bar, Green Innovations
name: It's All Made Up (IAMU)

description: We are dedicated to amplifying solutions at the intersection of sustainability, community, and art - to solve our world's greatest problems and build a better tomorrow - as a global community of purpose-driven entrepreneurs, creatives & humans. On playa, we are helping green the burn thru example and leadership, hosting interactive workshops on wellness, climate, and psychedelics, and creating magical art pieces and curating musical experiences. Off playa, we are a year round community spreading the Ten Principles, sharing experiences of wonder and joy, and making the rest of the world feel more like playa one day at atime. Come join us!
name: IDEATE

description: Come find refuge from the elements of the Playa. Have an ice-cold michelada or a homemade pickleback at our bar, "The Fold". Or enjoy a hot tea while you listen to some funky beats. Make a paper crane with your best wishes and we'll deliver it safely to the temple before the Sunday burn.
name: Paper Cranes

description: Hot food and cold women
name: Snack Shack

description: "Seraphim" Art Support Camp
name: Seraphim

description: Come escape the heat and climb around a world where all is hammock.
name: Burning Questions

description: HAUNTED HOUSE BUT IN TENTS.  WEAR YOU BEST HALLOWEEN OUTFIT TO GET CANDY.  OPEN MONDAY THROUGH FRIDAY, 6 TO 11 AT SILICON VILLAGE.
name: MOTHERPRISMS' MAD HOUSE

description: The official den for those who have created and support the Gilded snake art installation. Got questions about the art? Come visit us. We are not a pit of vipers.
name: Gilded. Golden Snake Art Support

description: Purveyor of alpine fire and ice experiences in the black rock desert.
name: Swiss Chalet

description: MUSE is a nod, a wink, a slap on the bum. Our heartbeat is to seek, offer, and discover inspiration in both the obvious and the peculiar places. To create a nurturing home on playa, to host our fellow burners, and enrich as many people's burning man experience as much as possible. We are curating a romantic French cafe by day and an amateur burlesque that encourages ALL forms of life to be in their most creative, authentic expressions. MUSE will be in collaborating with "The Womb" art piece located in Deep Playa and at homebase, igniting the playful & seductive spirit of the feminine power.
name: MUSE Cafe

description: Afternoon tea, cold brew coffee, and quick-play tabletop games inside a beautiful Mongolian style yurt!
name: Yurt Cafe

description: Scientists associated with the Moonlight Collective have been studying the phenomena known as the Prairie of Possibilities since the 1960's. It is apparently heading for the Playa; plans are under way to intercept and study this mysterious yet mesmerizing field of glowing, swaying prairie grass. Visit the Moonlight Collective Field Camp for morning tea, review their research, and record your own story to be shared with the Prairie Entity.
name: Moonlight Collective

description:
Hicktown-based with international flair - campmates from Wyoming, Canada, New Zealand, Russia, Australia, Germany, Netherlands... aaaand I'm definitely missing some.  
Come visit for public lounge, clothing boutique, large-scale painting, shitty punch and more!
name: Camp Shit Ain't Right

description: Meet us in The Hotel Lobby. With a lavish chandelier, a lux hotel bar, bellhop service, concierge desk, and a buzzing karaoke lounge, you'll be treated to 5-star service and a dusty bev in a welcoming and weird hotel lobby.
name: The Hotel Lobby

description: Greetings and salutations! We are are phasmantis, a group hailing from Los Angeles and Seattle. We come bearing gifts of snow cones, poptarts, and shenanigans at all times. Come stop by for some heavy bass music, drinks, or a high five
name: Phasmantis

description: Ranger Outpost Tokyo - the Black Rock Ranger Station in the 9:00 Sector where participants in need of assistance can seek out the help of a friendly Black Rock Ranger. Located at 9:00 and C.
name: Ranger Outpost Tokyo

description: Come out and find a real living walking talking robot giraffe! His name is Russell and he dwells at the Electric Giraffe Safari Park! Come find us and pet his nose! He'll actually talk to you! And if we're driving about, feel free to ask for a ride!
name: Electric Giraffe Safari Park III

description: Look for the Torii Temple Gate, bow in, and immerse yourself in the Place of the Way. The Year of the Wood Tiger meets Return of the Dragon, with courtesy, integrity, and indomitable spirit; you're ready to Enter The Dojo. Daily classes in martial arts, yoga, movement arts, ecstatic dance, meditation, sound healing baths. Youth programming: Kids Karate daily 10am, yoga for all ages. Offering training space to like-minded movement artists: Teach on our cushioned canvas barefoot mat for clean feet: AcroYoga, Capoeira, Judo, Jiu Jitsu, gymnastics... Events: Shoes-off daylight dance party, ecstatic dance vibe. Kumite Tournament for the martial artists — send your camp's best fighter to defend your camp's honor and compete in the first-ever Black Rock City Kumite! *Family / Kid friendly.
name: Burner Dojo

description: Home to the Iron Monkeys, the creators of REM Cafe and Croquet
name: Iron Monkeys

description: We value open mindset and sexuality - swing by to experience unique DreamHOLE.
name: DreamSWAT

description: Come celebrate the new moon and new beginnings, enjoy out-of-this-world snow cones and get a spritzing!
name: MOON LANDING

description: Hop on the Brainiac and take a ride to Somewhere Else! We go to Lots of Places and we might take you there! We operate like a taxi and we are happy to take you (and maybe even your stuff) on whatever errand you've got. Let's have an adventure.... where are we going?  We are open most of the time, driving the car around, day and night. We hope you stop by!
name: Brainiac

description: The wheel of bugs and splendor provides guests the opportunity to face their fears by spinning a wheel and delight in some dried tasty treats.
name: Wheel of Bugs and Splendor

description: na
name: baby dragon camp

description:
The title comes from Mebuyan, a goddess from Filipino mythology, specifically the Bagobo mythology, a large indigenous peoples of southern Mindanao, Philippines. 

She's a goddess of life and death, of the afterlife, traditionally represented as a woman living underground, sitting on a wooden mortar, with breasts covering her entire body. She is said to be nourishing the dead spirits of children in the afterlife, so that they can
grow up and continue on their journey to adulthood.

Banua Mebuyan is the mythological town where she lives cares for these spirits. The camp is the HQ for Mebuyan Vessel, a large scale installation in deep playa, who aims to be a nourishing, transformative, and cosmic place for citizens of Black Rock City for their personal and collective growth.
name: Mebuyan Vessel

description: We are dream makers. Man plus machine. We create futuristic and enhanced experiences through our artist showcases coupled with our innovative build and creations. We make and revive art cars and share it with the Playa. Drop by, at our camp for an immersive sunrise gathering, enjoy a Turkish Coffee, or ride in our art car drifting through Playa sunsets.
name: Dream Makers

description: Drop in for a cheerful "Slice of Home"—Playa-style. Participate in our Experimental Grilled Cheese Theatre, climb the sky-high HomeSlice Tower's inverted pyramids, or re-engineer your Playa duds and gear at our Radical Alteration clinics.
name: HomeSlice
